title: GoPro: Introducing Pro Handlebar / Seatpost / Pole Mount
description:
A compact aluminum mount designed for serious cyclists and bikers, the Pro Handlebar / Seatpost / Pole Mount fits standard handlebars and seatposts 22.2mm to 35mm in diameter. Lock down securely with the included 4mm hex key and rotate the camera 360° for unlimited capture options. 

If your best days are spent on two wheels, look no further—this mount is engineered to withstand whatever vibes the road, mountain or dirt can dish out. 

As always, happy capturing! 

You might see examples of extreme use in this video. Please take appropriate precautions to ensure your own safety and the safety of those around you, and to protect your GoPro camera.
